search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Microsoft Teams (microsoft-teams.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Microsoft Teams is: [https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-teams/microsoft-teams-pricing](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-teams/microsoft-teams-pricing)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: All Microsoft Teams Product Plans | Microsoft Teams

extracted_content.content:

![Image 16: Two person having video call on a laptop](https://cdn-dynmedia-1.microsoft.com/is/image/microsoftcorp/Blade001_Hero_1920x600X2-1?resMode=sharp2&op_usm=1.5,0.65,15,0&wid=1920&qlt=95&fit=constrain)

Get ready for the future of work with Microsoft Teams
=====================================================

Transform the way you work with next-generation AI capabilities and bring together your physical and digital worlds.

[Get started](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-teams/teams-products#video)

 

Make collaboration easier and smarter
-------------------------------------

Stay focused, work together, and achieve more with one platform for all your communication needs.

![Image 17](https://cdn-dynmedia-1.microsoft.com/is/image/microsoftcorp/Blade003_Basic%20icon_75x75X2?resMode=sharp2&op_usm=1.5,0.65,15,0&wid=50&hei=50&qlt=100&fmt=png-alpha&fit=constrain)

### Start with Teams basics 

Make a call, start a chat, or send a meeting invite with the ability to customize the meeting experience for your needs.

![Image 18](https://cdn-dynmedia-1.microsoft.com/is/image/microsoftcorp/Blade003_Premium%20icon_75x75X2?resMode=sharp2&op_usm=1.5,0.65,15,0&wid=50&hei=50&qlt=100&fmt=png-alpha&fit=constrain)

### Grow with Teams Premium

Make Teams meetings even more personalized, intelligent, and protected.

![Image 19](https://cdn-dynmedia-1.microsoft.com/is/image/microsoftcorp/Blade003_Add-on%20icon_75x75X2?resMode=sharp2&op_usm=1.5,0.65,15,0&wid=50&hei=50&qlt=100&fmt=png-alpha&fit=constrain)

### Transform work with add-ons and devices

Modernize your workplace with Teams Rooms, Teams Phone, and devices that improve inclusivity.

Explore how companies are succeeding with Teams
-----------------------------------------------

Across industries and sectors, Teams brings people together to do their best work.

[Enterprise](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-teams/teams-products#xc72060ba233840ff9e4fff27e8240ee6) [Small business](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-teams/teams-products#xd2b3a4fc11ee4b0d9477997666873518) [Home](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-teams/teams-products#x559fd376aaf84556b3b73b4d88891d5f) [Education](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-teams/teams-products#x92ef799429cc453b8587273f24738f80) [Frontline](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-teams/teams-products#x81cc5d348e8645a8ad8ef9e8f973b6e4)

Previous Next

![Image 20: A presentation being shown on the screen while others take notes of it](https://cdn-dynmedia-1.microsoft.com/is/image/microsoftcorp/Blade006_Teams%20for%20enterprise_800x450X2_Enterprise-1?resMode=sharp2&op_usm=1.5,0.65,15,0&wid=800&hei=450&qlt=100&fit=constrain)

### Teams for enterprise

A professional meeting solution designed to help enterprises communicate:

*   Unlimited group meetings for up to 30 hours  
*   10GB of OneDrive cloud storage per user
*   Anytime phone and web support  
*   Unlimited chat with coworkers and customers
*   File sharing, tasks, and polling
*   Data encryption for meetings, chat, calls, and  files  
*   Microsoft 365 Copilot is available as an add-on[1](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-teams/teams-products#Footnote1).

[Learn more](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-teams/enterprise/teams-enterprise)

Teams pairs perfectly with Microsoft 365
----------------------------------------

![Image 21: A man sitting at a desk using a laptop.](https://cdn-dynmedia-1.microsoft.com/is/image/microsoftcorp/Blade008_E3_788x450X2_Enterprise-1?resMode=sharp2&op_usm=1.5,0.65,15,0&wid=786&hei=443&qlt=100&fmt=png-alpha&fit=constrain)

### Microsoft 365 E3 (no Teams)

*   Microsoft 365 E3 combines best-in-class enterprise productivity apps with core security and compliance capabilities. 
*   Improve productivity and foster a culture of collaboration with connected experiences. 
*   Transform how you manage your business and enhance customer relationships with integrated workflows. 
*   Proactively protect your employees, data, and customer information with intelligent security. 
*   Microsoft 365 Copilot is available as an add-on[1](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-teams/teams-products#Footnote1). 

[Learn more](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/enterprise/e3?activetab=pivot%3aoverviewtab)

![Image 22: A group of people sitting around a table in a conference room.](https://cdn-dynmedia-1.microsoft.com/is/image/microsoftcorp/Blade008_E5_788x450X2_Enterprise-1?resMode=sharp2&op_usm=1.5,0.65,15,0&wid=786&hei=443&qlt=100&fmt=png-alpha&fit=constrain)

### Microsoft 365 E5 (no Teams)

*   Microsoft 365 E5 combines best-in-class productivity apps with advanced security, compliance, and analytical capabilities.​ 
*   Extend identity and threat protection with integrated and automated security to help stop damaging attacks.​ 
*   Bring together information protection and advanced compliance capabilities to protect and govern data while reducing risk.​ 
*   Benefit from Power BI capabilities that help you realize significant business value from your data.​ 
*   Microsoft 365 Copilot is available as an add-on[1](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-teams/teams-products#Footnote1). 

[Learn more](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/enterprise/e5?activetab=pivot%3aoverviewtab)

Explore add-ons for Teams plans
-------------------------------

![Image 23: A woman is taking a picture of her friend on her phone.](https://cdn-dynmedia-1.microsoft.com/is/image/microsoftcorp/Blade010_Teams%20Phone_382x218X2_Small%20Business-1?resMode=sharp2&op_usm=1.5,0.65,15,0&wid=786&hei=443&qlt=100&fmt=png-alpha&fit=constrain)

### Microsoft Teams Phone (Standard, Calling Plan, or E5)

Add cloud-based telephone services to Teams to get all the features of a landline—make and receive calls outside your organization, transfer calls between devices, and transcribe calls.

[Learn more](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-teams/microsoft-teams-phone)

![Image 24: A man is sitting at a desk using a laptop.](https://cdn-dynmedia-1.microsoft.com/is/image/microsoftcorp/Blade010_Teams%20Room_382x218X2_Small%20Business?resMode=sharp2&op_usm=1.5,0.65,15,0&wid=786&hei=443&qlt=100&fmt=png-alpha&fit=constrain)

### Microsoft Teams Rooms (Basic or Pro)

Strengthen hybrid work with enhanced meeting experiences for up to 25 rooms for free with Teams Rooms Basic—designed to make everyone feel included, no matter where they’re working. Or upgrade to pro to get enterprise-grade security and AI-powered audio and video.

[Learn more](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-teams/microsoft-teams-rooms)

![Image 25: A woman sitting at a desk with two monitors, laptop and a headset.](https://cdn-dynmedia-1.microsoft.com/is/image/microsoftcorp/Blade008_Basic_382x218X2_Small%20Business-1?resMode=sharp2&op_usm=1.5,0.65,15,0&wid=786&hei=443&qlt=100&fmt=png-alpha&fit=constrain)

### Microsoft 365 Copilot

Transform the way you work with AI in Teams. Amplify your productivity with next-generation AI capabilities with Microsoft 365 Copilot.  See eligibility requirements.[1](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-teams/teams-products#Footnote1)

[Learn more](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/microsoft-copilot)

![Image 26: A woman is taking a selfie on her phone.](https://cdn-dynmedia-1.microsoft.com/is/image/microsoftcorp/Blade010_Teams%20Premium_382x218X2_Enterprise-1?resMode=sharp2&op_usm=1.5,0.65,15,0&wid=786&hei=443&qlt=100&fmt=png-alpha&fit=constrain)

### Microsoft Teams Premium

Get additional features in Teams for AI-powered intelligence, more personalization, and increased security.

[Learn more](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-teams/premium)

![Image 27: A man is using a tablet at a conference table.](https://cdn-dynmedia-1.microsoft.com/is/image/microsoftcorp/Blade010_Teams%20devices_382x218X2_Small%20Business-1?resMode=sharp2&op_usm=1.5,0.65,15,0&wid=786&hei=443&qlt=100&fmt=png-alpha&fit=constrain)

### Teams devices

Communicate more equitably with inclusive, high-quality audio devices that pair seamlessly with Teams.

[Learn more](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-teams/across-devices/devices)

Explore how companies are succeeding with Teams
-----------------------------------------------

Across industries and sectors, Teams brings people together to do their best work.

    ![Image 28: A man is sitting at a table with a tablet in front of him.](https://cdn-dynmedia-1.microsoft.com/is/image/microsoftcorp/Blade011_ABN_1600x600X2_Enterprise-1:VP1-539x400?resMode=sharp2&op_usm=1.5,0.65,15,0&wid=1920&qlt=100&fit=constrain)

![Image 29: ABN AMRO](https://cdn-dynmedia-1.microsoft.com/is/image/microsoftcorp/Blade011_ABN%20Logo_247x72X2_Enterprise?resMode=sharp2&op_usm=1.5,0.65,15,0&wid=140&hei=35&qlt=100&fmt=png-alpha&fit=constrain)

### ABN AMRO meets customers anywhere for financial advice with Teams

> “With our Teams-based video banking service, every customer immediately gets an advisor.” 

Vincent Bakker: Daily Banking Advisor, ABN AMRO

[Read the story](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2247035&clcid=0x409&culture=en-us&country=us)

![Image 30: A woman in her office checking some notes while working on the laptop](https://cdn-dynmedia-1.microsoft.com/is/image/microsoftcorp/Blade006_Small%20Business_800x450X2_Small%20Business-1?resMode=sharp2&op_usm=1.5,0.65,15,0&wid=800&hei=450&qlt=100&fit=constrain)

### Teams for small businesses

Grow your customers as you connect to anyone, anywhere, all from one communication platform for up to 300 people.

[Learn more](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-teams/small-medium-business)

Grow your customers
-------------------

![Image 31: A woman in a business suit is using a laptop to make a video call.](https://cdn-dynmedia-1.microsoft.com/is/image/microsoftcorp/Blade008_Essentials_382x218X2_Small%20Business-1?resMode=sharp2&op_usm=1.5,0.65,15,0&wid=786&hei=443&qlt=100&fmt=png-alpha&fit=constrain)

### Microsoft Teams Essentials

*   Get an affordable, simple way to reach customers by video, chat, and phone.
*   Have unlimited group meetings for up to 30 hours.
*   Host up to 300 participants per meeting.
*   Enjoy 10 GB of cloud storage per user.
*   Microsoft 365 Copilot is available as an add-on[1](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-teams/teams-products#Footnote1).

[Learn more](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-teams/essentials?activetab=pivot%3aoverviewtab)

![Image 32: A woman sitting at a desk with two monitors, laptop and a headset.](https://cdn-dynmedia-1.microsoft.com/is/image/microsoftcorp/Blade008_Basic_382x218X2_Small%20Business-1?resMode=sharp2&op_usm=1.5,0.65,15,0&wid=786&hei=443&qlt=100&fmt=png-alpha&fit=constrain)

### Microsoft 365 Business Basic

Get Teams, plus Microsoft 365 web apps.

*   Use the latest versions of Word, Excel, PowerPoint, OneNote, and Outlook on the web.
*   Connect people to content and processes through SharePoint.
*   Enjoy 1 TB of cloud storage per user.
*   Microsoft 365 Copilot is available as an add-on[1](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-teams/teams-products#Footnote1).

[Learn more](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/business/microsoft-365-business-basic?activetab=pivot%3aoverviewtab)

![Image 33: A woman is holding a tablet in her hands.](https://cdn-dynmedia-1.microsoft.com/is/image/microsoftcorp/Blade008_Standard_382x218X2_Small%20Business-1?resMode=sharp2&op_usm=1.5,0.65,15,0&wid=786&hei=443&qlt=100&fmt=png-alpha&fit=constrain)

### Microsoft 365 Business Standard

Get Teams, desktop versions of Microsoft 365 apps, and workflow automation.

*   Install the full desktop versions of Word, Excel, PowerPoint, OneNote, and Outlook. Build automated workflows between apps and services.
*   Use intelligent search and discovery to easily find what you’re looking for across all your data. 
*   Microsoft 365 Copilot is available as an add-on[1](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-teams/teams-products#Footnote1).

[Learn more](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/business/microsoft-365-business-standard?activetab=pivot%3aoverviewtab)

![Image 34: A screen showing a group of people in a meeting.](https://cdn-dynmedia-1.microsoft.com/is/image/microsoftcorp/Blade008_Premium_382x218X2_Small%20Business-1?resMode=sharp2&op_usm=1.5,0.65,15,0&wid=786&hei=443&qlt=100&fmt=png-alpha&fit=constrain)

### Microsoft 365 Business Premium

Get Teams, other productivity apps, and cloud services.

*   Improve productivity and collaboration.
*   Enjoy 1 TB of cloud storage per user.
*   Help secure devices that connect to your data.
*   Microsoft 365 Copilot is available as an add-on[1](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-teams/teams-products#Footnote1).

[Learn more](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/business/microsoft-365-business-premium?activetab=pivot%3aoverviewtab)

Explore add-ons for Teams plans
-------------------------------

![Image 35: A woman is taking a picture of her friend on her phone.](https://cdn-dynmedia-1.microsoft.com/is/image/microsoftcorp/Blade010_Teams%20Phone_382x218X2_Small%20Business-1?resMode=sharp2&op_usm=1.5,0.65,15,0&wid=786&hei=443&qlt=100&fmt=png-alpha&fit=constrain)

### Microsoft Teams Phone (Standard, Calling Plan, or E5)

Add cloud-based telephone services to Teams to get all the features of a landline—make and receive calls outside your organization, transfer calls between devices, and transcribe calls.

[Learn more](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-teams/microsoft-teams-phone)

![Image 36: A man is sitting at a desk using a laptop.](https://cdn-dynmedia-1.microsoft.com/is/image/microsoftcorp/Blade010_Teams%20Room_382x218X2_Small%20Business?resMode=sharp2&op_usm=1.5,0.65,15,0&wid=786&hei=443&qlt=100&fmt=png-alpha&fit=constrain)

### Microsoft Teams Rooms (Basic or Pro)

Strengthen hybrid work with enhanced meeting experiences for up to 25 rooms for free with Teams Rooms Basic—designed to make everyone feel included, no matter where they’re working. Or upgrade to pro to get enterprise-grade security and AI-powered audio and video.

[Learn more](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-teams/microsoft-teams-rooms)

![Image 37: A woman sitting at a desk with two monitors, laptop and a headset.](https://cdn-dynmedia-1.microsoft.com/is/image/microsoftcorp/Blade008_Basic_382x218X2_Small%20Business-1?resMode=sharp2&op_usm=1.5,0.65,15,0&wid=786&hei=443&qlt=100&fmt=png-alpha&fit=constrain)

### Microsoft 365 Copilot

Transform the way you work with AI in Teams. Amplify your productivity with next-generation AI capabilities with Microsoft 365 Copilot.  See eligibility requirements[1](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-teams/teams-products#Footnote1).​

[Learn more](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/microsoft-copilot)

![Image 38: A woman is taking a selfie on her phone.](https://cdn-dynmedia-1.microsoft.com/is/image/microsoftcorp/Blade010_Teams%20Premium_382x218X2_Enterprise-1?resMode=sharp2&op_usm=1.5,0.65,15,0&wid=786&hei=443&qlt=100&fmt=png-alpha&fit=constrain)

### Microsoft Teams Premium

Get additional features in Teams for AI-powered intelligence, more personalization, and increased security.

[Learn more](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-teams/premium)

![Image 39: A man is using a tablet at a conference table.](https://cdn-dynmedia-1.microsoft.com/is/image/microsoftcorp/Blade010_Teams%20devices_382x218X2_Small%20Business-1?resMode=sharp2&op_usm=1.5,0.65,15,0&wid=786&hei=443&qlt=100&fmt=png-alpha&fit=constrain)

### Teams devices

Communicate more equitably with inclusive, high-quality audio devices that pair seamlessly with Teams.

[Learn more](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-teams/across-devices/devices)

Explore how companies are succeeding with Teams
-----------------------------------------------

Across industries and sectors, Teams brings people together to do their best work.

    ![Image 40: A man wearing a mask is pointing at a whiteboard.](https://cdn-dynmedia-1.microsoft.com/is/image/microsoftcorp/Blade011-REI-1600x600X2:VP1-539x400?resMode=sharp2&op_usm=1.5,0.65,15,0&qlt=85)

![Image 41: REI CO OP](https://cdn-dynmedia-1.microsoft.com/is/image/microsoftcorp/Blade011_REI%20Logo_247x72X2_Small%20Business?resMode=sharp2&op_usm=1.5,0.65,15,0&wid=140&hei=35&qlt=100&fmt=png-alpha&fit=constrain)

### REI improves employees’ experience with Teams Phone

> “Our goal is to continue to improve the user experience, so we enable people to work almost entirely within Teams without having to bounce back and forth between different applications.” 

Ted Fagerness: Manager, Voice and Video for IT Infrastructure Engineering, REI

[Read the full story](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2247919&clcid=0x409&culture=en-us&country=us)

![Image 42: A woman with two kids are smiling and using laptop](https://cdn-dynmedia-1.microsoft.com/is/image/microsoftcorp/Blade006_Personal_800x450X2_Home-1?resMode=sharp2&op_usm=1.5,0.65,15,0&wid=800&hei=450&qlt=100&fit=constrain)

### Teams for personal use

Send messages, coordinate events, and share photos with your friends, family, and community. Catch up with people near and far through virtual meetups.

[Learn more](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-teams/teams-for-home)

Connect with your friends, family, and community
------------------------------------------------

![Image 43: A young man sitting at a desk using a laptop.](https://cdn-dynmedia-1.microsoft.com/is/image/microsoftcorp/Blade008_Teams_517x296X2_Home-1?resMode=sharp2&op_usm=1.5,0.65,15,0&wid=786&hei=443&qlt=100&fmt=png-alpha&fit=constrain)

### Microsoft Teams (free)

The no-cost Teams option

*   Send instant messages.
*   Schedule group audio or video calls for up to 60 minutes.
*   Create communities to share ideas and make plans.

[Learn more](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-teams/free)

![Image 44: A woman sitting at a table with a laptop and bowl of food.](https://cdn-dynmedia-1.microsoft.com/is/image/microsoftcorp/Blade008_Personal_517x296X2_Home-1?resMode=sharp2&op_usm=1.5,0.65,15,0&wid=786&hei=443&qlt=100&fmt=png-alpha&fit=constrain)

### Microsoft 365 Personal

Teams for one person, Microsoft 365 apps, and advanced security

*   Schedule group audio or video calls for up to 30 hours.
*   Get the full desktop versions of Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Outlook.
*   Enjoy 1 TB of cloud storage.

[Learn more](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-teams/compare-microsoft-teams-home-options)

![Image 45: A family sitting on a couch using a laptop.](https://cdn-dynmedia-1.microsoft.com/is/image/microsoftcorp/Blade008_Family_517x296X2_Home-1?resMode=sharp2&op_usm=1.5,0.65,15,0&wid=786&hei=443&qlt=100&fmt=png-alpha&fit=constrain)

### Microsoft 365 Family

Teams accounts for up to six people, Microsoft 365 apps, and advanced security

*   Schedule group audio or video calls for up to 30 hours.
*   Get the full desktop versions of Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Outlook.
*   Enjoy 6 TB of cloud storage (1 TB per person).

[Learn more](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-teams/compare-microsoft-teams-home-options)

![Image 46: Two kids using laptop in the living room](https://cdn-dynmedia-1.microsoft.com/is/image/microsoftcorp/Blade006_Education_800x450X2_Education-1?resMode=sharp2&op_usm=1.5,0.65,15,0&wid=800&hei=450&qlt=100&fit=constrain)

### Teams for education

Stay organized and connected to all your students. Easily create lessons using templates and personalize learning for each student with insights for educators.

[Learn more](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-teams/education)

Simplify class management and learning
--------------------------------------

![Image 47: A boy is using a laptop in a classroom.](https://cdn-dynmedia-1.microsoft.com/is/image/microsoftcorp/Blade008_Office365_788x450X2_Education-1?resMode=sharp2&op_usm=1.5,0.65,15,0&wid=786&hei=443&qlt=100&fmt=png-alpha&fit=constrain)

### Office 365 Education (A1, A3, and A5)

Free Teams for education for eligible students and educators, plus Microsoft 365 apps

*   Get Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and OneNote.
*   Connect to the cloud with OneDrive and SharePoint to modernize your classroom.
*   Access the apps from all your devices.

[Learn more](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2247772&clcid=0x409&culture=en-us&country=us)

![Image 48: A boy and girl are sitting on the grass looking at an ipad.](https://cdn-dynmedia-1.microsoft.com/is/image/microsoftcorp/Blade008_Microsoft_788x450X2_Education-1?resMode=sharp2&op_usm=1.5,0.65,15,0&wid=786&hei=443&qlt=100&fmt=png-alpha&fit=constrain)

### Microsoft 365 Education (A1, A3, and A5)

Teams for education and Microsoft 365 apps

*   Choose from three different plans to suit your school’s needs.
*   Help students grow in core subjects with Learning Accelerators.
*   Give students the same access to tools and software.

[Learn more](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2248007&clcid=0x409&culture=en-us&country=us)

![Image 49: A woman server in coffee house using her mobile](https://cdn-dynmedia-1.microsoft.com/is/image/microsoftcorp/Blade006_Frontline_800x450X2_Frontline-1?resMode=sharp2&op_usm=1.5,0.65,15,0&wid=800&hei=450&qlt=100&fit=constrain)

### Teams for frontline workers

Transform your frontline workforce by unifying your organization’s communications and business processes on one secure platform.

[Learn more](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-teams/frontline-workforce)

Empower frontline workers with a secure, connected experience
-------------------------------------------------------------

![Image 50: A woman standing in a warehouse looking at boxes.](https://cdn-dynmedia-1.microsoft.com/is/image/microsoftcorp/Blade008_F1_788x450X2_Frontline-1?resMode=sharp2&op_usm=1.5,0.65,15,0&wid=786&hei=443&qlt=100&fmt=png-alpha&fit=constrain)

### Microsoft 365 F1

Teams, basic apps, and security features

*   Lay the foundation for secure organization-wide communication with Viva Connections, Viva Engage, and SharePoint.
*   Get shift and task management features, as well as push-to-talk communication.
*   Use the web versions of Excel, Word, and PowerPoint to increase operational efficiency.

[Learn more](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/enterprise/f1)

![Image 51: A man with a tablet in front of a tank.](https://cdn-dynmedia-1.microsoft.com/is/image/microsoftcorp/Blade008_F3_788x450X2_Frontline-1?resMode=sharp2&op_usm=1.5,0.65,15,0&wid=786&hei=443&qlt=100&fmt=png-alpha&fit=constrain)

### Microsoft 365 F3

*   Get all the productivity apps of Microsoft 365 F1, plus: Windows and the web version of Outlook
*   Make repetitive tasks easy using workflow automation in PowerApps and Power Automate—a part of Power Platform (limited capabilities with this license).
*   Safeguard company assets with intelligent security that won’t slow down frontline productivity.

[Learn more](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/enterprise/f3)

Explore add-ons for Teams plans
-------------------------------

![Image 52: A woman is taking a picture of her friend on her phone.](https://cdn-dynmedia-1.microsoft.com/is/image/microsoftcorp/Blade010_Teams%20Phone_382x218X2_Small%20Business-1?resMode=sharp2&op_usm=1.5,0.65,15,0&wid=786&hei=443&qlt=100&fmt=png-alpha&fit=constrain)

### Microsoft Teams Phone (Standard, Calling Plan, or E5)

Add cloud-based telephone services to Teams to get all the features of a landline—make and receive calls outside your organization, transfer calls between devices, and transcribe calls.

[Learn more](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-teams/microsoft-teams-phone)

![Image 53: A man is sitting at a desk using a laptop.](https://cdn-dynmedia-1.microsoft.com/is/image/microsoftcorp/Blade010_Teams%20Room_382x218X2_Small%20Business?resMode=sharp2&op_usm=1.5,0.65,15,0&wid=786&hei=443&qlt=100&fmt=png-alpha&fit=constrain)

### Microsoft Teams Rooms (Basic or Pro)

Strengthen hybrid work with enhanced meeting experiences for up to 25 rooms for free with Teams Rooms Basic—designed to make everyone feel included, no matter where they’re working. Or upgrade to pro to get enterprise-grade security and AI-powered audio and video.

[Learn more](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-teams/microsoft-teams-rooms)

![Image 54: A man is using a tablet at a conference table.](https://cdn-dynmedia-1.microsoft.com/is/image/microsoftcorp/Blade010_Teams%20devices_382x218X2_Small%20Business-1?resMode=sharp2&op_usm=1.5,0.65,15,0&wid=786&hei=443&qlt=100&fmt=png-alpha&fit=constrain)

### Teams devices

Communicate more equitably with inclusive, high-quality audio devices that pair seamlessly with Teams.

[Learn more](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-teams/across-devices/devices)

![Image 55: A woman is taking a selfie on her phone.](https://cdn-dynmedia-1.microsoft.com/is/image/microsoftcorp/Blade010_Teams%20Premium_382x218X2_Enterprise-1?resMode=sharp2&op_usm=1.5,0.65,15,0&wid=786&hei=443&qlt=100&fmt=png-alpha&fit=constrain)

### Microsoft Teams Premium

Get additional features in Teams for AI-powered intelligence, more personalization, and increased security.

[Learn more](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-teams/premium)

Explore how companies are succeeding with Teams
-----------------------------------------------

Across industries and sectors, Teams brings people together to do their best work.

    ![Image 56: A group of people looking at bottles of perfume in a store.](https://cdn-dynmedia-1.microsoft.com/is/image/microsoftcorp/Blade011_loreal_1600x600X2_Frontline-1:VP1-539x400?resMode=sharp2&op_usm=1.5,0.65,15,0&qlt=85)

![Image 57: LOREAL](https://cdn-dynmedia-1.microsoft.com/is/image/microsoftcorp/Blade011_REI%20Logo_247x72X2_Small%20Business-1?resMode=sharp2&op_usm=1.5,0.65,15,0&wid=140&hei=35&qlt=100&fmt=png-alpha&fit=constrain)

### L’Oréal empowers beauty advisors with Teams

> “We use Teams to create the sense of belonging that empowers beauty advisors to be the best ambassadors for their individual brands.”

Nicolas Koller: Head of IT Retail, L’Oréal

[Read the full story](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2247771&clcid=0x409&culture=en-us&country=us)

[Back to tabs](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-teams/teams-products#xc72060ba233840ff9e4fff27e8240ee6-tab)

Get started with Microsoft Teams today
--------------------------------------

[Sign up for free](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=2123761&lm=deeplink&lmsrc=NeutralHomePageWeb&cmpid=FreemiumSignUpFooter&tfloptin=true&clcid=0x409&culture=en-us&country=us) [Download App](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-teams/download-app)

![Image 58](https://cdn-dynmedia-1.microsoft.com/is/content/microsoftcorp/Home-1)

### Home

[Learn more](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-teams/teams-for-home)

![Image 59](https://cdn-dynmedia-1.microsoft.com/is/content/microsoftcorp/Business)

### Business

[Learn more](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-teams/small-medium-business)

![Image 60](https://cdn-dynmedia-1.microsoft.com/is/content/microsoftcorp/Enterprise)

### Enterprise

[Learn more](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-teams/enterprise)

![Image 61](https://cdn-dynmedia-1.microsoft.com/is/content/microsoftcorp/Education)

### Education

[Learn more](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-teams/education)

\[1\]  Microsoft 365 Copilot may not be available for all markets and languages. To purchase, customers must have a qualifying plan for [enterprise](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/enterprise/copilot-for-microsoft-365#FAQ) or [business](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/business/copilot-for-microsoft-365#FAQ).

Follow Microsoft Teams
----------------------

*   [![Image 62: Twitter logo](https://cdn-dynmedia-1.microsoft.com/is/image/microsoftcorp/Twitter-34?scl=1)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=2132086)
*   [![Image 63: Instagram logo](https://cdn-dynmedia-1.microsoft.com/is/image/microsoftcorp/Instagram%202x?scl=1)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=2202629)
*   [![Image 64: YouTube logo](https://cdn-dynmedia-1.microsoft.com/is/image/microsoftcorp/YouTube%202x?scl=1)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=2202418)
*   [![Image 65: Blog logo](https://cdn-dynmedia-1.microsoft.com/is/image/microsoftcorp/Blog?scl=1)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=2132085)

What's new

*   [Surface Pro](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/surface/devices/surface-pro-11th-edition)

Microsoft Store

Education

*   [Microsoft in education](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/education)

Business

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing details include various tiers and add-ons for different business needs.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Affordable, simple way to reach customers by video, chat, and phone.
features: Unlimited group meetings for up to 30 hours
Host up to 300 participants per meeting
10 GB of cloud storage per user

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Get Teams, plus Microsoft 365 web apps.
features: Use the latest versions of Word, Excel, PowerPoint, OneNote, and Outlook on the web
Connect people to content and processes through SharePoint
1 TB of cloud storage per user

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Enterprise productivity apps with core security and compliance capabilities.
features: Improve productivity and foster a culture of collaboration
Transform how you manage your business and enhance customer relationships
Proactively protect your employees, data, and customer information

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Advanced security, compliance, and analytical capabilities.
features: Bring together information protection and advanced compliance capabilities
